articles.title: 3 Must-Know Facts About Peloton Before You Buy the Stock
articles.content: Peloton has transitioned from a hardware-focused company to a subscription-based model, but it continues to struggle with profitability and a heavy debt load. The fitness industry is highly competitive, and Peloton faces challenges in maintaining its market position.

articles.title: 1 Technology ETF to Buy With $1,000 and Hold Forever
articles.content: The Vanguard Information Technology ETF (VGT) has outperformed the S&P 500 over the past decade, with a 534% total return. The ETF's top holdings, including Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia, have benefited from various technology trends. While investing in technology carries risks, the ETF's low expense ratio and diversification make it an attractive long-term investment option.

articles.title: Could Apple Help You Retire a Millionaire?
articles.content: Apple's stock has soared 34% since May 1 as the tech giant beat expectations in Q3 2024 and announced plans to make a massive push into the AI industry. The company's R&D spending has hit a 20-year high, raising questions about what Apple has in store. With its strong cash flow and potential to dominate the consumer AI market, Apple's stock could see significant growth over the next decade.
